title: Ukraine: Ministers can now detain Russian planes in UK
description: Flights linked to Russia are also criminalised in measures targeting figures close to the Kremlin.

title: Sloppy England shocked by Windies at World Cup
description: England engineer their own downfall in a damaging seven-run defeat by West Indies at the Women's World Cup in Dunedin.

title: The Papers: Zelensky channels Churchill and US-UK oil ban
description: The Ukrainian president's address to the Commons and a ban on Russian oil imports dominate the papers.

title: War in Ukraine: McDonald’s, Coca-Cola and Starbucks halt Russian sales
description: Western companies are turning their backs on Russia amid sanctions and violence in Ukraine.

title: Women's World Cup: Deandra Dottin takes sensational catch against England to dismiss Winfield-Hill
description: West Indies' Deandra Dottin takes a sensational catch to dismiss England's Lauren Winfield-Hill at the Women's World Cup.

title: War in Ukraine: West hits Russia with oil bans and gas curbs
description: The US bans Russian oil, targeting the Russian economy's "main artery" over its invasion of Ukraine.

title: War in Ukraine: Warning oil sanctions will further hit UK living costs
description: Plans to ban or curb Russian oil and gas imports will further hit UK living standards, analysts say.

title: Zimbabwe clinics struggle for nurses after exodus to the UK
description: With large numbers of nurses emigrating, patient care is suffering as there are not enough staff.

title: Russia-Ukraine: Is internet on verge of break-up?
description: The global internet is under threat as the conflict in Ukraine continues.

title: What is going on with the partygate probe?
description: Stories about Covid rule breaking in No 10 have gone away but police activities are continuing.

title: Almost two million pupils regularly missing school
description: The number of children missing at least half of school is also greater than previously thought.

title: Private military firms see demand in Ukraine war
description: Private military contractors see surging demand in Ukraine - but could the work turn mercenary?

title: Stool tests might help spot early pancreatic cancer
description: Detectable changes involving gut microbes "could provide" a warning sign that a tumour is present.

title: Online Safety Bill tweaked to target scam ads
description: Social media sites may soon be legally required to stop scam adverts under new online safety laws.

title: CEO Secrets: Drone boss Henri Seydoux shares his advice
description: Henri Seydoux, founder and CEO of French drone specialists Parrot, shares his business advice.

title: 'We are not co-operating': Life in occupied Ukraine
description: Ukrainian cities are now occupied by Russian troops, and residents are not making them feel welcome.

title: Ukraine: Family escapes Kharkiv to Poland to treat daughter's cancer
description: After four days on the run, three-year-old Polina and her mother have made it out of Ukraine.

title: War in Ukraine: Troops dig in near Kyiv
description: Ukrainians are determined to defend their capital city as Russian troops prepare for an assault.
